verses.verse: Now <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H2204>old<s%> and <S%H7646>full<s%> of <S%H3117>days<s%>; and he made <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
And he gathered <S%H622>together<s%> all the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, with the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>.

And the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> were <S%H5608>numbered<s%> from <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H1121>years<s%> old and <S%H4605>upward<s%>: and their <S%H4557>number<s%> by their <S%H1538>polls<s%>, <S%H1397>man<s%> by <S%H1397>man<s%>, was <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%>.

Of <S%H428>these<s%>, <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> were to <S%H5329>oversee<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> were <S%H7860>officers<s%> and <S%H8199>judges<s%>;

and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> were <S%H7778>doorkeepers<s%>; and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1984>praised<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> with the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> which I <S%H6213>made<s%>, said <S%H1984>David<s%>, to praise therewith.
And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H2505>divided<s%> them into <S%H4256>courses<s%> according to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>: <S%H1648>Gershon<s%>, <S%H6955>Kohath<s%>, and <S%H4847>Merari<s%>.
Of the <S%H1649>Gershonites<s%>: <S%H3936>Ladan<s%> and <S%H8096>Shimei<s%>.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3936>Ladan<s%>: <S%H3171>Jehiel<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%>, and <S%H2241>Zetham<s%>, and <S%H3100>Joel<s%>, <S%H7969>three<s%>.

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8096>Shimei<s%>: <S%H8019>Shelomoth<s%>, and <S%H2381>Haziel<s%>, and <S%H2039>Haran<s%>, <S%H7969>three<s%>. These were the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses of <S%H3936>Ladan<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8096>Shimei<s%>: <S%H3189>Jahath<s%>, <S%H2126>Zina<s%>, and <S%H3266>Jeush<s%>, and <S%H1283>Beriah<s%>. These <S%H702>four<s%> were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8096>Shimei<s%>.

And <S%H3189>Jahath<s%> was the <S%H7218>chief<s%>, and <S%H2125>Zizah<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%>: but <S%H3266>Jeush<s%> and <S%H1283>Beriah<s%> had not <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>; therefore they became a <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6486>reckoning<s%>.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%>: <S%H6019>Amram<s%>, <S%H3324>Izhar<s%>, <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>, and <S%H5816>Uzziel<s%>, <S%H702>four<s%>.

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6019>Amram<s%>: <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%>; and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> was <S%H914>separated<s%>, that he should <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> the <S%H6944>most<s%> holy <S%H6944>things<s%>, he and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>, to burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, to <S%H8334>minister<s%> unto <S%H1288>him<s%>, and to bless in his <S%H8034>name<s%>, <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
But as for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, his <S%H1121>sons<s%> were <S%H7121>named<s%> among the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>: <S%H1647>Gershom<s%> and <S%H461>Eliezer<s%>.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1647>Gershom<s%>: <S%H7619>Shebuel<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H461>Eliezer<s%> <S%H7345>were<s%>: Rehabiah the <S%H7218>chief<s%>; and <S%H461>Eliezer<s%> had no <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>; but the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7345>Rehabiah<s%> were <S%H4605>very<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%>.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3324>Izhar<s%>: <S%H8019>Shelomith<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%>.

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron<s%>: <S%H3404>Jeriah<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%>, <S%H568>Amariah<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%>, <S%H3166>Jahaziel<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%>, and <S%H3360>Jekameam<s%> the <S%H7243>fourth<s%>.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5816>Uzziel<s%>: <S%H4318>Micah<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%>, and <S%H3449>Isshiah<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%>.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%>: <S%H4249>Mahli<s%> and <S%H4187>Mushi<s%>. The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4249>Mahli<s%>: <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and <S%H7027>Kish<s%>.

And <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>, and had no <S%H1121>sons<s%>, but <S%H1323>daughters<s%> <S%H251>only<s%>: and their brethren the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish<s%> took them to <S%H5375>wife<s%>.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4187>Mushi<s%>: <S%H4249>Mahli<s%>, and <S%H5740>Eder<s%>, and <S%H3406>Jeremoth<s%>, <S%H7969>three<s%>.

These were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> after their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses<s%>, even the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses of those of them that were <S%H6485>counted<s%>, in the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8034>names<s%> by their <S%H1538>polls<s%>, who <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H1121>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>.

For <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, hath given <S%H5117>rest<s%> unto his <S%H5971>people<s%>; and he <S%H7931>dwelleth<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>:
and also the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall no more have need to <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> and all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of it for the service <S%H5656>thereof<s%>.

For by the <S%H314>last<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> the sons of <S%H3881>Levi<s%> were <S%H4557>numbered<s%>, from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%>.

For their <S%H4612>office<s%> was to <S%H3027>wait<s%> on the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, in the <S%H2691>courts<s%>, and in the <S%H3957>chambers<s%>, and in the <S%H2893>purifying<s%> of all holy <S%H6944>things<s%>, even the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>;

for the <S%H3899>showbread<s%> <S%H5560>also<s%>, and for the fine flour for a <S%H4503>meal-offering<s%>, whether of <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H7550>wafers<s%>, or of that which is baked in the <S%H4227>pan<s%>, or of that which is <S%H7246>soaked<s%>, and for all manner of <S%H4884>measure<s%> and <S%H4060>size<s%>;
and to <S%H5975>stand<s%> every <S%H1242>morning<s%> to <S%H3034>thank<s%> and <S%H1984>praise<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and likewise at <S%H6153>even<s%>;

and to <S%H5927>offer<s%> all <S%H5930>burnt-offerings<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, on the <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%>, on the new <S%H2320>moons<s%>, and on the set <S%H4150>feasts<s%>, in <S%H4557>number<s%> according to the <S%H4941>ordinance<s%> concerning <S%H8548>them<s%>, continually <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>;

and that they should <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, and the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4931>place<s%>, and the charge of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> their <S%H251>brethren<s%>, for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
